thread.title: George Richard Cassel
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by George Richard Cassel

author: George Richard Cassel
title: George Richard Cassel
text:
Went looking for a new bed had a great salesmen
Had us test quite a few different beds till we found the one we like
Plus the extras that came with the bed were great
Love the store and I do recommend people to shop there
